artist: Artist: Unknown; Artist: After Michel Le Blon
catalogue_raissonne: copy in reverse after a print listed in Van der Kellen as 33
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: reverse copy: roundel: seated female figure inside a cathedral interior at R; standing angel at woman's L side; floral leaf border; backward inscription at bottom center
inscription: inscription in plate at bottom center which, unreversed, reads: DN IOA POMERENIO DD MI BLONDVS / 1610
markings: red stamp on verso, bottom center: Charles-Frédéric Mewès, Lugt 4171
provenance: Charles-Frédéric Mewès (1858-1914), Lugt 4171, born Strasbourg. [Kate Ganz, London; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: in mirror writing at lower edge of plate: MI BLONDVS
title: The Annunciation
